mapper.sql: id, idcard_no, phonenumber, name, sex, picture_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tm_teacher WHERE 1=1
and id like concat('%',#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and idcard_no like concat('%',#{idcardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and phonenumber like concat('%',#{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sex like concat('%',#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and picture_url like concat('%',#{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_by like concat('%',#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_date like concat('%',#{createDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_by like concat('%',#{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and update_date like concat('%',#{updateDateStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and remarks like concat('%',#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tm_teacher (id, idcard_no, phonenumber, name, sex, picture_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks) VALUES (#{id},#{idcardNo},#{phonenumber},#{name},#{sex},#{pictureUrl},#{createBy},#{createDate},#{updateBy},#{updateDate},#{remarks})

id,

mapper.update:
UPDATE tm_teacher
idcard_no = #{idcardNo},
phonenumber = #{phonenumber},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
picture_url = #{pictureUrl},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_date = #{createDate},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_date = #{updateDate},
remarks = #{remarks},
WHERE id = #{id}
